visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts gauge chart with a custom background shape. The chart should have a title 'Demo of custom background shape in Highcharts'. The axes and labels should be styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include a single series named 'Direction' with a single data point set to 0. The chart should also include custom colors for the dial and pivot. Additional configurations should include disabling tooltips, setting animation duration, and enabling dynamic updates to the gauge value every 3 seconds.

title.text: Demo of custom background shape in Highcharts

labels.formatter: function () { let style = ''; const scale = document.getElementById('container').offsetWidth * 0.005; if (this.value.length === 1) { style = 'font-size:' + (scale * 1.3) + 'em'; } else if (this.value.length === 2) { style = 'font-size:' + (scale * 0.8) + 'em'; } return '' + this.value + ''; }

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration sets up a gauge chart with a custom background shape. The chart type is specified as 'gauge', and it includes a title 'Demo of custom background shape in Highcharts'. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes, ensuring readability and consistency. The data series includes a single series named 'Direction' with an initial data point of 0. Custom colors are applied to the dial and pivot for a cohesive visual theme. Additional configurations disable tooltips, set the animation duration for series updates, and enable dynamic updates to the gauge value every 3 seconds, enhancing interactivity. The chart also includes custom JavaScript functions to draw and update the background shape, ensuring it adapts to the chart's dimensions.
